description:
When Emilia the hero finally tracks down the ruler of demons here on Earth, he`s not exactly what she was expecting. Which may or may not make her a little crazy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Heldin wagt sich in die Feste des Dämonenkönigs, weil sie ihre Arbeit ernstnimmt
The Hero Stays at the Devil`s Castle for Work Reasons
Yuusha, Shigoto Yuusen de Maou-jou ni Tomaru
勇者, 仕事優先で魔王城に泊まる
